item.title: Single Room
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Superior Room

Experience a relaxing and comfortable stay in the cozy Superior Room with a beautiful view.

Overview

Enjoy ultimate comfort in the rooms complete with everything we have carefully prepared for you to relax, from bedding materials to firmness of the mattress, lighting design, furniture layout and amenities.

Experience a feast of rich and abundant flavors presented by buffet restaurant Topaz, including fresh dishes cooked with seasonal ingredients, various cuisines of the East and West, and dishes cooked live on site at the live station.

The restaurant has two private rooms for small family gatherings like birthdays or parties, as well as group events.

Detail Capacity 2 persons (max. 2 persons) Bed 1 King Bed Rooms 1 bed room, 1 bath room Size 30m² View Garden View Check-in 14:00 Check-out 12:00 054.779.7374

Features

Versatile space for simple personal relaxation A sophisticated working experience Safe room for you to stay peacefully A sound sleep with soft and comfortable bedding

Service

Various benefits are offered to our guests. Hotel Room Complimentary use of the indoor swimming pool Complimentary baby crib upon request Complimentary use of the fitness center Extra bed Complimentary parking during your stay Food and beverage service in the room

Ready to book?

When would you like to stay? [mphb_availability_calendar id="116" monthstoshow="2"]

Book Now

[mphb_availability id="116"]

Deluxe Room

Deluxe Room is classy with indirect lighting on light wood walls that create a bright and cozy mood. View Room

item.title: Luxury Suite Room
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Luxury Suite

Luxury Suite is a spacious room with the living room separated from the bedroom, offering ultimate comfort and a cozy mood.

Overview

Enjoy ultimate comfort in the rooms complete with everything we have carefully prepared for you to relax, from bedding materials to firmness of the mattress, lighting design, furniture layout and amenities.

Experience a feast of rich and abundant flavors presented by buffet restaurant Topaz, including fresh dishes cooked with seasonal ingredients, various cuisines of the East and West, and dishes cooked live on site at the live station.

The restaurant has two private rooms for small family gatherings like birthdays or parties, as well as group events.

Detail Capacity 2 persons (max. 2 persons) Bed 1 King Bed Rooms 1 bed room, 1 bath room Size 120m² View Garden View Check-in 14:00 Check-out 12:00 054.779.7374

Features

Versatile space for simple personal relaxation A sophisticated working experience Safe room for you to stay peacefully A sound sleep with soft and comfortable bedding

Service

Various benefits are offered to our guests. Hotel Room Complimentary use of the indoor swimming pool Complimentary baby crib upon request Complimentary use of the fitness center Extra bed Complimentary parking during your stay Food and beverage service in the room

Ready to book?

When would you like to stay? [mphb_availability_calendar id="116" monthstoshow="2"]

Book Now

[mphb_availability id="116"]

Superior Room

Experience a relaxing and comfortable stay in the cozy Superior Room with a beautiful view. View Room

item.title: Signature Room
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Signature Room

Experience a relaxing and comfortable stay in the cozy Superior Room with a beautiful view.

Overview

Enjoy ultimate comfort in the rooms complete with everything we have carefully prepared for you to relax, from bedding materials to firmness of the mattress, lighting design, furniture layout and amenities.

Experience a feast of rich and abundant flavors presented by buffet restaurant Topaz, including fresh dishes cooked with seasonal ingredients, various cuisines of the East and West, and dishes cooked live on site at the live station.

The restaurant has two private rooms for small family gatherings like birthdays or parties, as well as group events.

Detail Capacity 3 persons (max. 3 persons) Bed 1 King Bed Rooms 1 bed room, 1 bath room Size 70m² View Garden View Check-in 14:00 Check-out 12:00 054.779.7374

Features

Versatile space for simple personal relaxation A sophisticated working experience Safe room for you to stay peacefully A sound sleep with soft and comfortable bedding

Service

Various benefits are offered to our guests. Hotel Room Complimentary use of the indoor swimming pool Complimentary baby crib upon request Complimentary use of the fitness center Extra bed Complimentary parking during your stay Food and beverage service in the room

Ready to book?

When would you like to stay? [mphb_availability_calendar id="85" monthstoshow="2"]

Book Now

[mphb_availability id="116"]

Luxury Suite

Luxury Suite is a spacious room with the living room separated from the bedroom, offering ultimate comfort and a cozy mood. View Room

The restaurant has two private rooms for small family gatherings like birthdays or parties, as well as group events.

item.title: Deluxe Room
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Deluxe Room

Deluxe Room is classy with indirect lighting on light wood walls that create a bright and cozy mood.

Overview

Enjoy ultimate comfort in the rooms complete with everything we have carefully prepared for you to relax, from bedding materials to firmness of the mattress, lighting design, furniture layout and amenities.

Experience a feast of rich and abundant flavors presented by buffet restaurant Topaz, including fresh dishes cooked with seasonal ingredients, various cuisines of the East and West, and dishes cooked live on site at the live station.

The restaurant has two private rooms for small family gatherings like birthdays or parties, as well as group events.

Detail Capacity 2 persons (max. 3 persons) Bed 1 King Bed Rooms 1 bed room, 1 bath room Size 55m² View Garden View Check-in 14:00 Check-out 12:00 054.779.7374

Features

Versatile space for simple personal relaxation A sophisticated working experience Safe room for you to stay peacefully A sound sleep with soft and comfortable bedding

Service

Various benefits are offered to our guests. Hotel Room Complimentary use of the indoor swimming pool Complimentary baby crib upon request Complimentary use of the fitness center Extra bed Complimentary parking during your stay Food and beverage service in the room

Ready to book?

When would you like to stay? [mphb_availability_calendar id="96" monthstoshow="2"]

Book Now

[mphb_availability id="116"]

Signature Room

Signature Suite offers ultimate dignity and value with a bedroom, living room, office and reception room. View Room

item.title: Superior Room
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Superior Room

Experience a relaxing and comfortable stay in the cozy Superior Room with a beautiful view.

Overview

Enjoy ultimate comfort in the rooms complete with everything we have carefully prepared for you to relax, from bedding materials to firmness of the mattress, lighting design, furniture layout and amenities.

Experience a feast of rich and abundant flavors presented by buffet restaurant Topaz, including fresh dishes cooked with seasonal ingredients, various cuisines of the East and West, and dishes cooked live on site at the live station.

The restaurant has two private rooms for small family gatherings like birthdays or parties, as well as group events.

Detail Capacity 2 persons (max. 2 persons) Bed 1 King Bed Rooms 1 bed room, 1 bath room Size 30m² View Garden View Check-in 14:00 Check-out 12:00 054.779.7374

Features

Versatile space for simple personal relaxation A sophisticated working experience Safe room for you to stay peacefully A sound sleep with soft and comfortable bedding

Service

Various benefits are offered to our guests. Hotel Room Complimentary use of the indoor swimming pool Complimentary baby crib upon request Complimentary use of the fitness center Extra bed Complimentary parking during your stay Food and beverage service in the room

Ready to book?

When would you like to stay? [mphb_availability_calendar id="116" monthstoshow="2"]

Book Now

[mphb_availability id="116"]

Deluxe Room

Deluxe Room is classy with indirect lighting on light wood walls that create a bright and cozy mood. View Room

item.title: Hello world!

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy your glorious moments

Carefully designed to relieve your fatigue from work where you can feel for yourself what it is like to truly relax in nature.

The Ultimate Comfort

Regain your vigor in the snug luxurious bed. A soft touch by using nature-friendly materials that inspire business and travel

Soft and comfortable bedding

Gives a relaxing impression with furniture motivated by natural elements like wood to rest your tired eyes All of our accommodation options comprise luxury amenities such as tea & coffee makers, minibars, flat screen televisions, fluffy bathrobes and slippers, hair dryers, and exclusive Pure Altitude toiletries. Superior Room Deluxe Room Signature Room Luxury Suite

Superior Room

Experience a relaxing and comfortable stay in the cozy Superior Room with a beautiful view.

Capacity
2 persons (max. 2 persons)

Rooms
1 bed room, 1 bath room

Bed
Twin Beds, King Bed

View Room

Deluxe Room

Deluxe Room is classy with indirect lighting on light wood walls that create a bright and cozy mood.

Capacity
2 persons (max. 3 persons)

Rooms
1 bed room, 1 bath room

Bed
Twin Beds, King Bed

View Room

Signature Room

Signature Suite offers ultimate dignity and value with a bedroom, living room, office and reception room.

Capacity
3 persons (max. 3 persons)

Rooms
1 bed room, 1 bath room

Bed
King Bed, Queen Bed

View Room

Luxury Suite

Luxury Suite is a spacious room with the living room separated from the bedroom, offering ultimate comfort and a cozy mood.

Capacity
4 persons (max. 4 persons)

Rooms
2 bed rooms, 2 bath rooms

Bed
King Bed, Queen Bed

View Room

Discover a unique alpine wellness experience with mountain herb-scented sauna, mountain crystal steam bath, Valaisan wood sauna, glacier shower and relaxation waterbeds! Furthermore, our large swimming pool and Jacuzzi await you. In summer, our garden invites for sunbathing and reading on our lounge chairs


Hotel Manager

Value

Enjoy many experiences you will discover in the Algarve. Let yourself be tempted by magnificent landscapes and warm climate of southern Portugal.

Stay

Cozy and comfortable rooms
with peaceful landscape

View rooms

Experience

Special experience
with premium services
and facilities

Learn more

Taste

A feast of delicacies
created with the know-how
of top chefs and carefully
selected ingredients

Learn more

Celebrate

Ultimate space for special occasions

Learn more

Many activities surround our accommodations. You’ ll have a great choice of experiences to live. Consider extending your stay if you want to discover everything before you leave.

123 Fifth Floor East 26th Street, New York, NY 10011

By Car

Approximately 5 minutes from St. Moritz ramp way, or 10 minutes from Piz Albana ramp.

By Train

Approximately 5 minutes from Shibuya ramp way, or 10 minutes from Takagi-cho ramp way by car.

item.title: Our Rooms
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our Rooms

Carefully designed to relieve your fatigue from work where you can feel for yourself what it is like to truly relax in nature.

The Ultimate Comfort

Regain your vigor in the snug luxurious bed. A soft touch by using nature-friendly materials that inspire business and travel

Soft and comfortable bedding

Gives a relaxing impression with furniture motivated by natural elements like wood to rest your tired eyes

Stay

All of our accommodation options comprise luxury amenities such as tea & coffee makers, minibars, flat screen televisions, fluffy bathrobes and slippers, hair dryers, and exclusive Pure Altitude toiletries.

Superior Room

Experience a relaxing and comfortable stay in the cozy Superior Room with a beautiful view.

Capacity 2 persons (max. 2 persons) Rooms 1 bed room, 1 bath room Bed Twin Beds, King Bed

Deluxe Room

Deluxe Room is classy with indirect lighting on light wood walls that create a bright and cozy mood.

Capacity 2 persons (max. 3 persons) Rooms 1 bed room, 1 bath room Bed Twin Beds, King Bed

Signature Room

Signature Suite offers ultimate dignity and value with a bedroom, living room, office and reception room.

Capacity 3 persons (max.3 persons) Rooms 1 bed room, 1 bath room Bed King Bed, Queen Bed

Luxury Suite

Luxury Suite is a spacious room with the living room separated from the bedroom, offering ultimate comfort and a cozy mood.

Capacity 4 persons (max. 4 persons) Rooms 2 bed rooms, 2 bath rooms Bed King Bed, Queen Bed

item.title: Dining
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ultimate Dining

Enjoy both a buffet and à la carte, offers a feast of delicacies created by the chef

Top quality ingredients

We offer a variety of dishes cooked with top quality ingredients and a dining experience resembling the nature

Authentic cuisine

Premium courses cooked with top quality ingredients. Neat plating that adds more taste to the cuisine

Overview

Experience the profound taste of authentic cuisine at Hoteller decorated in a luxurious and cozy mood inspired by modern architecture that tell the futuristic stories

Experience a feast of rich and abundant flavors presented by buffet restaurant Topaz, including fresh dishes cooked with seasonal ingredients, various cuisines of the East and West, and dishes cooked live on site at the live station.

The restaurant has two private rooms for small family gatherings like birthdays or parties, as well as group events.

Detail Location 1F Seats 80 seats Breakfast 07:00-10:00 Lunch 12:00-15:00 Dinner 18:00-21:00 054.779.7374

GAllery

Over 200 kinds of dishes that gratify your senses Fresh Various cuisines of the East and West Delicious Perfect place for small banquets and parties Breakfast Fresh, nature-inspired dishes Seasonal

Discover a unique alpine wellness experience with mountain herb-scented sauna, mountain crystal steam bath, Valaisan wood sauna, glacier shower and relaxation waterbeds! Furthermore, our large swimming pool and Jacuzzi await you. In summer, our garden invites for sunbathing and reading on our lounge chairs


Hotel Manager

Each of our properties are uniquely positioned but are connected through a trail of peerless service

item.title: About The Hotel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy your most glorious moments with Hoteller B&B. Enjoy ultimate comfort in the rooms complete with everything we have carefully prepared for you to relax, from bedding materials to firmness of the mattress, lighting design, furniture layout and amenities.

Our Philosophy

Avana Hotel Bed & Breakfast

All of our accommodation options comprise luxury amenities such as tea & coffee makers, minibars, flat screen televisions, fluffy bathrobes and slippers, hair dryers, and exclusive Pure Altitude toiletries.

Enjoy your most glorious moments with Hoteller Bed & Breakfast

Carefully designed to relieve your fatigue from work where you can feel for yourself what it is like to truly relax in nature.

item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Contact US

Enjoy your most glorious moments
with Hoteller B&B. [contact-form-7 id="513" title="Contact form"]

FAQ

What is a hotel check in/out time?

Discover a unique alpine wellness experience with mountain herb-scented sauna, mountain crystal steam bath, Valaisan wood sauna, glacier shower and relaxation waterbeds! Furthermore, our large swimming pool and Jacuzzi await you. In summer, our garden invites for sunbathing and reading on our lounge chairs

Do you have a bed for baby?

Discover a unique alpine wellness experience with mountain herb-scented sauna, mountain crystal steam bath, Valaisan wood sauna, glacier shower and relaxation waterbeds! Furthermore, our large swimming pool and Jacuzzi await you. In summer, our garden invites for sunbathing and reading on our lounge chairs

When can I cancel the room reservation? Is there any penalty for cancellation?

Discover a unique alpine wellness experience with mountain herb-scented sauna, mountain crystal steam bath, Valaisan wood sauna, glacier shower and relaxation waterbeds! Furthermore, our large swimming pool and Jacuzzi await you. In summer, our garden invites for sunbathing and reading on our lounge chairs

Can I access to the Internet service in hotel room?

Discover a unique alpine wellness experience with mountain herb-scented sauna, mountain crystal steam bath, Valaisan wood sauna, glacier shower and relaxation waterbeds! Furthermore, our large swimming pool and Jacuzzi await you. In summer, our garden invites for sunbathing and reading on our lounge chairs

Address

123 Fifth Floor East 26th Street, 
New York, NY 10011

info@hotellerbnb.com
+67-43-567-6678
